p: Due to the error-prone RdRp, RNA viruses generate 10 − 4 to 10 − 6 mutations per nucleotide [ 58], which leads to high mutation rates and increased genetic diversity [ 59]. Genetic evolution of EV-A71 can be clustered into three main genotypes A, B and C, whereas genotypes B and C include five sub-genotypes, B1-B5 and C1-C5, respectively [ 60]. EV-A71 has been documented in several studies and observed inter- and intra-genotype shifts in the evolution around Asian-Pacific countries (Table 1). The shifts had also co-occurred with EV-A71 outbreaks.
